item.title: CVE-2023-5989|2023-12-21T09:45:37.933Z -- uyumsoft%20information%20system%20and%20technologies -- lioxerp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Uyumsoft Information System and Technologies LioXERP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects LioXERP: before v.146.
